getButtonImage

public static org.newdawn.slick.Image getButtonImage(Button button)
Determines the Image to draw based on the given state.

UP: getImage() if enabled, otherwise getDisabledImage() DOWN: getDownImage() if it exists, otherwise getImage() ROLLOVER: getRolloverImage() if it exists, otherwise getImage()

getToggleButtonImage

getObjectX

public static float getObjectX(int align,
                               float x,
                               float width,
                               Padding pad,
                               float objWidth)
Deprecated. use getObjectX(Object, int)

Gets the y position of an object that has the specified height, based on alignment and padding.

Parameters:
align - the alignment type
x - the component's x position
width - the component's width
objWidth - the width of the object being aligned
